text: Welcome to DU! The truly grassroots left-of-center political community where regular people, not algorithms, drive the discussions and set the standards. The rapturous applause in that moment shows that the party is with her point of view, as well. (29,655 posts) [ananda](/?com=profile&uid=154189) 6. Yes, I thought so too. Thu Aug 22, 2024, 11:29 PM 5 min ago She clearly sees the tragedy on both sides and is seeking a solution that is just to both. (524 posts) [PeaceWave](/?com=profile&uid=323134) 7. I loved that Kamala made no reference to statehood. Self determination yes. Statehood no. Thu Aug 22, 2024, 11:29 PM 5 min ago (14,148 posts) [Think. Again.](/?com=profile&uid=369113) 8. I agree, a perfect balance of recognizing the suffering and fears.... Thu Aug 22, 2024, 11:32 PM 2 min ago ...of both the Isrealis and the Palestinians. And what a huge, loud, positive response from the arena!
